Texts.Eng:
Being a mutated hybrid of human and a pony, while they do behave like former, they do take part in some equine activities such as eating hay and watching My Little Human: Warfare is Magic.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% E. Regen.
  +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  ^green;Resist^reset;: ^green;15^reset;% Radiation, Poison
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Rad Burn and Radiation.

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Radioactive-type biomes: Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, and ^green;25^reset;% E. Regen, Damage & Defense x^red;0.95^reset;.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Yo-Yo: +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  Swords: Damage x^green;1.125^reset;, +^green;2.5^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Shadow, Cosmic, -^red;100^reset;% Fire
  Defense x^red;0.85^reset;
